text: I am a graduate student in the Neuroimaging and Informatics Master’s Program at the University of Southern California (USC). My research interest involves applying data science and machine learning to optimize image analysis, particularly MRI brain data.

I am a graduate student in the Neuroimaging and Informatics Master’s Program at the University of Southern California (USC). My research interest involves applying data science and machine learning to optimize image analysis, particularly MRI brain data.
